1.content:
You sit at your desk in your bedroom, lamp light illuminating the various papers strewn across the table. You were filling out an application to a rather exclusive college that had sent you a mysterious invitation during the final weeks of your senior year of high school. Most of the was quite simple: Name, date of birth, school ranking, etc.

However, by the third page, the questions were growing rather odd: Sexuality, possible STIs, favorite fetishes, and other personal information.

After filling in the remaining information, you returned to page one to review your information entered...

Name, gender, and age?
1.title: Applying for College

choices: [None of these; continue to more choices]
11.content:
After determining that all the information that he had entered was correct, Matt included the complete application with the enclosed reply letter in a plain, white envelope and mailed it to the mysterious college. Several weeks had went by and the thoughts of the college letter being a crude prank to gather sexual details on the gullible. It wasn't until the fifth Thursday that a brown envelope arrived in the mail with his name on it.

After dropping the rest of the mail on the coffee table and dashing up to his room with a slam of the door behind him, the strapping young man opened the envelope to reveal the contents, a pamphlet, a list of recommended supplies, and other information about the college; it was an acceptance package!

Matthew decided to start on the letter that was on the top of the stack, Reading it to himself:

Dear Mr. Whelmer,
Upon reviewing your application with the highest level of scrutiny that is legally possible , The staff at Collegium Libidine is pleased to announce your acceptance into our school of _________. Pursuing a degree in this school will allow you to grow and thrive in the area of ______. Your first semester will begin on the August 17th and we encourage incoming students to arrive a week prior to their start date to learn campus layout, attend orientation events, and settle into your dorm room. Enclosed is a map from the address provided to our campus alongside the west coast.

Thank you for your interest in Collegium Libidine and we hope to see you soon!

Signed, Charles Rickshaw
Headmaster of Collegium Libidine

Matthew was so excited to read that his application was accepted and immediately began to pack and plan the decent drive to the campus. After all....
Semester one was set to start in a few weeks!

info.brief_description: Learn and participate in degrees that focus on your favorite fetishes with no worries.
info.description:
Rules
1. This is a adult rated interactive story due to content; View MUST be the legal age to view this material.
2. The required chapter length is 3 paragraphs at least, this rule is disregarded for simple decision chapters. (I.E. "Are you Male, Female, or Herm?)
3. Content is NOT limited in any way. Anything goes!
4.Have fun!
5.Rate and review for improved content and more chapters by author!

Updates
August 22nd, 2014
Interactive story opened to the public.
